背景与边框

其他

On this page

1. 半透明边框 ​

半透明边框
<template>
  <div class="container">
    <div class="box"></div>
  </div>
</template>
<style scoped>
.container {
  display: flex;
  width: 150px;
  height: 150px;
  background: url("../../public/墙壁.jpg") no-repeat 100% 100%;
}
.box {
  border: 10px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4);
  width: 100px;
  height: 100px;
  background: white;
  background-clip: padding-box;
}
</style>

2. 边框内圆角 ​

2个div实现
1个div实现
边框内圆角
<template>
  <div class="container">
    <div class="box">
      <div class="inner-box">2个div实现</div>
    </div>
    <div class="box2">1个div实现</div>
  </div>
</template>
<style scoped>
.container {
  display: flex;
}
.box {
  padding: 0.8em;
  background: #655;
  margin-right: 20px;
}
.inner-box {
  padding: 1em;
  border-radius: 0.8em;
  background: tan;
}
.box2 {
  padding: 0.8em;
  background: tan;
  border-radius: 0.8em;
  outline: 0.8em solid #655;
}

</style>

3. 多重边框 ​

多重边框
background、border、outline、box-shadow
<template>
  <div class="container">
    <div class="multiple-border"></div>
  </div>
</template>
<style scoped>
.container {
  display: flex;
}
.multiple-border {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  background: red;
  border: 10px solid skyblue;
  outline: 10px solid seagreen;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 20px purple;
}
</style>

4. 背景定位 ​

背景定位
background-position
<template>
  <div class="container">
    <div class="bg-box">
    </div>
  </div>
</template>
<style scoped>
.container {
  display: flex;
}
.bg-box {
  width: 200px;
  height: 100px;
  background: #58a url('../../public/圣诞老人.png') no-repeat;
  background-size: 20px;
  background-position: right 20px bottom 10px;
}

</style>

4. 条纹背景 ​

条纹背景
linear-gradient
<template>
  <div class="container">
    <div class="f-bg f-bg1"></div>
    <div class="f-bg f-bg2"></div>
    <div class="f-bg f-bg3"></div>
    <div class="f-bg f-bg4"></div>
  </div>
</template>
<style scoped>
.container {
  display: flex;
}
.f-bg {
  width: 120px;
  height: 100px;
  margin-right: 15px;
}
.f-bg1 {
  background: linear-gradient(#fb3 50%, #58a 50%);
}
.f-bg2 {
  background: linear-gradient(#fb3 50%, #58a 50%);
  background-size: 100% 20px;
}
.f-bg3 {
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #fb3 50%, #58a 50%);
  background-size: 20px 100%;
}
.f-bg4 {
  background: linear-gradient(
    45deg,
    #fb3 25%,
    #58a 0,
    #58a 50%,
    #fb3 0,
    #fb3 75%,
    #58a 0
  );
}
</style>
